did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture Art and Planning. Knight Visual Resources Facility.

did.physdesc: Organizational records, photographs, architectural drawings and plans.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Administrative records from the Knight Visual Resources Facility including Annual Reports, memos, correspondence and photographs of the facility and staff. Oil portraits of Professor Charles Babcock by Anna Milo Upjohn, framed pastel portrait of Margaret Hicks, 3 oversize student drawings, plans, drawings and photographs.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Administrative records from the Knight Visual Resources Facility including Annual Reports, memos, correspondence and photographs of the facility and staff. Oil portraits of Professor Charles Babcock by Anna Milo Upjohn, framed pastel portrait of Margaret Hicks, 3 oversize student drawings, plans, drawings and photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of the office of the Dean of the College of Architecture, Art and Planning.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Knight Visual Resources Facility Records, #15-7-3816. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
